Patients recent active LN ( biopsyproven Class III/IV+/V LN accord ISN/RPS 2003 classification within 3 month , proteinuria > 0.5 g/day and/or active urinary sediment ) receive corticosteroid MMF ( 1g bd 6 month ) induction treatment . 2 . LN patient remission ( define proteinuria < 0.5 g/day inactive urinary sediment , prednisolone < 10 mg/day ) stable MMF maintenance ( dose unchanged within previous 3 month ) . 1 . Patients receive entericcoated mycophenolic acid ( myfortic ) . 2 . Patients receive concomitant calcineurin inhibitor ( e.g . cyclosporine tacrolimus ) corticosteroid MMF . 3 .
